name: bismark

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A tool to map bisulfite converted sequence reads and determine cytosine
methylation states

dependencies.name: bowtie2
dependencies.description:
Bowtie 2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning
sequencing reads to long reference sequences

dependencies.name: hisat2
dependencies.description:
HISAT2 is a fast and sensitive alignment program for mapping next-
generation sequencing reads (whole-genome, transcriptome, and exome
sequencing data) against the general human population (as well as
against a single reference genome).

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: samtools
dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format

dependent_to.name: fastq-screen
dependent_to.description:
FastQ Screen allows you to screen a library of sequences in FastQ format
against a set of sequence databases so you can see if the composition of
the library matches with what you expect.
